title: Medical Robotics
description: This interdisciplinary course focuses on a fundamental understanding of robot kinematics and dynamics as well as the design, development, and evaluation of a medical robotic system.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BMED 3110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BMED 3400 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
